tools.name: get_browser_errors
tools.description: Get recent browser errors (console errors, network failures, exceptions) from the Gasoline log. Useful for debugging web application issues.

tools.name: get_browser_logs
tools.description: Get all browser logs from the Gasoline log, including errors, warnings, and info messages.

limit.description: Maximum number of log entries to return (default: all)

tools.name: clear_browser_logs
tools.description: Clear all browser logs from the Gasoline log file.
